column2: Job description Locations:-  Hyderabad, Bangalore, Rajahmundry and Chennai JOB POSITION- ARDM (ASSOCIATE RECRUITMENT & DEVELOPMENT MANAGER) Job description : Primarily responsible for management and development of channel network to promote Insurance and consequently accountable for revenue generation and achievement of business targets by recruiting & developing the team of advisors & generating business through them. An ARDM act as a Recruiter, coach & sales leader. Recruiter An ARDM is responsible for Recruitment and development of quality advisors and encourage them for long term career. Recruit by selling career opportunity to such prospective advisors. To ensure that advisors undergo proper training on product, regulations and other selling inputs. Coach Monitoring the performance and daily activity of fast tracking of the advisors. Motivating their morale in order to retain the performing advisors and giving special attention to average performers and provide those need based training. Doing analysis of the need of the customer and ensuring high level of customer satisfaction leading to customer delight. Sales Leader Inculcate product as well as practical training to the advisors by accompanying them to client meetings and guiding, advising and motivating them on the sales funnel and achieving revenue targets. Carrying out various promotional activities for sales as well as for recruitment. Benefits: Enjoying the opportunity to help others achieve their full potential in a rewarding career. The ability to leverage skills through teaching and coaching other financial service professionals. A defined pathway into management. The opportunity to earn a very high income. Perks and benefits: Huge Incentives

column2: Flowserve Corporation pvt ltd is looking for Design Engineer , Control Valves to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     As a Senior Associate Partner in Agency Management, your role would involve overseeing and managing a team of agents or brokers within an insurance agency or brokerage firm       Here are some key responsibilities and activities typically associated with this position:       Team Leadership and Management: Leading and managing a team of agents or brokers, providing guidance, coaching, and support to help them achieve sales targets and business goals     Setting performance expectations, conducting performance reviews, and fostering a positive and motivated team culture     Business Development: Collaborating with agents or brokers to develop and execute strategies to expand the agency's client base and increase revenue     Identifying new business opportunities, cultivating relationships with prospective clients, and networking to generate leads     Providing support and guidance in client acquisition and relationship management     Sales and Marketing Support: Assisting agents or brokers in sales activities, including client meetings, presentations, and negotiations     Providing product knowledge, market insights, and sales training to enhance their effectiveness in promoting and selling insurance products or services     Collaborating with marketing teams to develop sales and marketing campaigns     Relationship Management: Building and maintaining strong relationships with clients, insurers, and other key stakeholders     Acting as a primary point of contact for key clients, addressing their needs, and ensuring high levels of client satisfaction     Collaborating with insurers and negotiating contracts to provide the best coverage options for clients     Performance Monitoring and Reporting: Monitoring and analyzing sales performance, production targets, and key performance indicators (KPIs) for the agency     Generating reports and providing insights to management on the team's performance, trends, and areas for improvement     Developing action plans and implementing strategies to enhance performance and meet business objectives

column2: Job description Key Responsibilities: Prospect, meet & convert potential customers to consistently achieve sales targets. Recruit good quality of Agency Leader & Insurance Advisors by prospecting, identifying, and sourcing good quality Agency Leader & insurance advisors through presentations, constant follow ups, collection of necessary documentation and ensuring attendance of the prospective Advisors & Agency Leaders in the training programme. Train the Agency Leader & Insurance Advisors through classroom and on the job training (accompanying them on sales calls, doing mock presentations, etc) to help them achieve sales targets. Achieve business targets- Plan and implement achievement of sales targets month after month by setting individual targets for each of the Agency Leader & Advisors in the team taking into consideration the Advisors potential and the total business target. Lead, motivate and develop the team of Agency Leader & Insurance Advisors- Sustain the team of motivated Agency Leader & Insurance Advisors through personal examples and by conducting motivational sessions, feedback Programmes, etc Qualification & Experience Required: Minimum 2 years of experience in sales.esponsibilities Preferred candidate profile Perks and benefits Role:   Agency ManagerIndustry Type:   InsuranceDepartment:   BFSI,   Investments & TradingEmployment Type:   Full Time, PermanentRole Category:   Life InsuranceEducationUG:   Any Graduate   Role & responsibilities Preferred candidate profile Perks and benefits Role:   Agency ManagerIndustry Type:   InsuranceDepartment:   BFSI,   Investments & TradingEmployment Type:   Full Time, PermanentRole Category:   Life InsuranceEducationUG:   Any Graduate   Role & responsibilities   Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Role & responsibilities     1)  Acquiring new health Agents or Advisors on a regular basis. Licensing and tracking activation of the same regularly. 2) Handling the health retail Product 3) Building relationships with Health agents. 4) Regular visit on field for sale of health policies with agents or individual. 5) Coordinating with other departments such as Underwriting, Claims, & Operations 6) To meet Agents, Lead providers, intermediaries on regular basis and maintaining records in a planned manner. 7) Training and motivating the health agents to qualify contests and thus bring in incremental business. Preferred candidate profile     1)  At least 6 months of on field sales experience in Agency / any Insurance product. 2) Graduation is mandatory, candidates holding Diploma or Part Time degree certificate will not fit in criteria. 3) Candidates with operation background will not be fit for this job profile 4) Need to work on 100% on-field for sales of health policies. Perks and benefits     1) 5 Days working (Saturday & Sunday off) 2) Travelling / Petrol Reimbursement. 3) Mediclaim and term-life insurance. 4) Candidates will be on the payroll of organization. If interested, kindly share your update resume at  ruchita.sudhala@ext.icicilombard.com

column2: Role & responsibilities   Conduct in-depth consultations with clients to assess their insurance requirements, understand their risk profiles, and identify coverage gaps. Provide expert advice on policy options, terms, and conditions. Analyze and evaluate existing insurance policies to ensure clients have adequate coverage. Recommend adjustments or additional coverage based on changes in clients' circumstances or industry trends. Actively participate in the sales process, including lead generation, client meetings, and presentations. Manage and nurture client relationships to enhance satisfaction and retention. Assess and manage risks for clients by staying informed about industry trends, regulatory changes, and emerging risks. Ensure timely and efficient resolution of claims. Stay up-to-date on industry regulations and compliance requirements. Ensure accurate and thorough documentation of client interactions and policy details. Preferred candidate profile     Minimum of 1 year of experience in the insurance industry, with a focus on consulting or client-facing roles. Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, or a related field. Proven sales and client relationship management skills. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Age Criteria:- 25 TO 40
